languages.text: "Вам предстоит провести первое в жизни собрание офицеров в роли Лорд-капитана. Для многих из тех, кто сейчас войдет на мостик, оно тоже будет первым. У нас огромные потери среди высшего и среднего офицерского состава — кого-то пришлось менять аж на четвертого заместителя, у кого-то замены вообще не нашлось, и сейчас палубные кланы решают, кто займет место обезглавленной команды".

traits.locale_text: "Вам предстоит провести первое в жизни собрание офицеров в роли Лорд-капитана. Для многих из тех, кто сейчас войдет на мостик, оно тоже будет первым. У нас огромные потери среди высшего и среднего офицерского состава — кого-то пришлось менять аж на четвертого заместителя, у кого-то замены вообще на нашлось".

languages.text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."
languages.original_text: "Вам предстоит провести первое в жизни собрание офицеров в роли Лорд-капитана. Для многих из тех, кто сейчас войдет на мостик, оно тоже будет первым. У нас огромные потери среди высшего и среднего офицерского состава — кого-то пришлось менять аж на четвертого заместителя, у кого-то замены вообще не нашлось, и сейчас палубные кланы решают, кто займет место обезглавленной команды".

traits.locale_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

"You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

"You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

languages.text: “您需要以新任领主舰长的身份，将军官召集起来，听取他们的简报。对于许多即将加入舰桥的新成员而言，这也同样是他们的首次简报会。我们的中高级军官遭受了惨重的损失，其中一部分职位不得不由这些阵亡军官副手的副手的副手来填补空缺，还有一些职位依然处于空缺状态。如今，甲板上的各个氏族正在讨论应该由哪些人来领导群龙无首的船员。”
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: “您需要以新任领主舰长的身份，将军官召集起来，听取他们的简报。对于许多即将加入舰桥的新成员而言，这也同样是他们的首次简报会。我们的中高级军官遭受了惨重的损失，其中一部分职位不得不由这些阵亡军官副手的副手的副手来填补空缺，还有一些职位依然处于空缺状态。如今，甲板上的各个氏族正在讨论应该由哪些人来领导群龙无首的船员。”

languages.text: 「あなたはロード・キャプテンとして初めての士官ブリーフィングを行う。これからブリッジで合流する多くの者にとっても、これが最初のブリーフィングとなる。上級士官や中級士官を大量に失ったため、副官の副官のさらに副官にいたる人材で補充せざるを得ないポストもあれば、まったく補充されないポストもある。今、デッキクランはリーダーのいないクルーを誰が引き継ぐかを決めている」
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはロード・キャプテンとして初めての士官ブリーフィングを行う。これからブリッジで合流する多くの者にとっても、これが最初のブリーフィングとなる。上級士官や中級士官を大量に失ったため、副官の副官のさらに副官にいたる人材で補充せざるを得ないポストもあれば、まったく補充されないポストもある。今、デッキクランはリーダーのいないクルーを誰が引き継ぐかを決めている」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst jetzt Euer erstes Offiziersbriefing in Eurer neuen Funktion als Lord Captain abhalten. Für viele, die auf der Brücke gleich zu uns stoßen werden, ist es ebenfalls das erste Briefing. Wir haben hohe Verluste in den höheren und mittleren Offiziersrängen erlitten – einige Posten mussten mit dem Stellvertreter des Stellvertreters des Stellvertreters besetzt werden, andere wurden gar nicht besetzt, und die Deck-Clans beraten jetzt, wer die führungslosen Crews übernimmt."
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst jetzt Euer erstes Offiziersbriefing in Eurer neuen Funktion als Lord Captain abhalten. Für viele, die auf der Brücke gleich zu uns stoßen werden, ist es ebenfalls das erste Briefing. Wir haben hohe Verluste in den höheren und mittleren Offiziersrängen erlitten – einige Posten mussten mit dem Stellvertreter des Stellvertreters des Stellvertreters besetzt werden, andere wurden gar nicht besetzt, und die Deck-Clans beraten jetzt, wer die führungslosen Crews übernimmt."

languages.text: « Vous allez devoir conduire votre première réunion d'officiers en tant que {mf|nouveau seigneur-capitaine|nouvelle seigneure-capitaine}. Pour nombre de ceux qui s'apprêtent à nous rejoindre sur la passerelle, il s'agira également d'une première. Nous avons essuyé des pertes massives parmi les officiers supérieurs et subalternes. Certaines positions ont été confiées à des adjoints d'adjoints d'adjoints, tandis que d'autres sont encore vacantes pendant que les équipes tentent de décider qui prendra leur tête. »
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez devoir conduire votre première réunion d'officiers en tant que {mf|nouveau seigneur-capitaine|nouvelle seigneure-capitaine}. Pour nombre de ceux qui s'apprêtent à nous rejoindre sur la passerelle, il s'agira également d'une première. Nous avons essuyé des pertes massives parmi les officiers supérieurs et subalternes. Certaines positions ont été confiées à des adjoints d'adjoints d'adjoints, tandis que d'autres sont encore vacantes pendant que les équipes tentent de décider qui prendra leur tête. »

languages.text: «Debe celebrar su primera sesión informativa para los oficiales en su nuevo puesto como Lord Capitán. Esta será también la primera sesión de muchos de los que se unirán a nosotros en el puente. Hemos sufrido grandes pérdidas de oficiales veteranos y de medio rango: algunos puestos han tenido que recaer en el delegado del delegado del delegado, mientras que otros han quedado totalmente vacíos, y ahora los clanes de cubierta están decidiendo quién tomará el control de las tripulaciones huérfanas».
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: «Debe celebrar su primera sesión informativa para los oficiales en su nuevo puesto como Lord Capitán. Esta será también la primera sesión de muchos de los que se unirán a nosotros en el puente. Hemos sufrido grandes pérdidas de oficiales veteranos y de medio rango: algunos puestos han tenido que recaer en el delegado del delegado del delegado, mientras que otros han quedado totalmente vacíos, y ahora los clanes de cubierta están decidiendo quién tomará el control de las tripulaciones huérfanas».

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan olarak yeni makamınız gereği ilk subaylar toplantınızı düzenlemeniz gerek. Bu, köprüde bulunacak çoğu kişinin de ilk toplantısı olacak. Kıdemli ve orta kademedeki subaylardan ağır zayiat verdik. Bazı mevkilerin vekilin vekilinin vekiliyle doldurulması gerekti, kimileriyse öylece bomboş kaldı. Güverte klanları, boşta kalmış ekipleri kimlerin devralacağını kararlaştırmakla meşgul."
languages.original_text: "You must now hold your first officers' briefing in your new role as Lord Captain. For many of those who are about to join us on the bridge, this will also be their first briefing. We sustained massive losses among the senior and middle-ranking officers — some posts have had to be filled by the deputy's deputy's deputy, while others go unfilled entirely, and now the deck clans are deciding who will take over the leaderless crews."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan olarak yeni makamınız gereği ilk subaylar toplantınızı düzenlemeniz gerek. Bu, köprüde bulunacak çoğu kişinin de ilk toplantısı olacak. Kıdemli ve orta kademedeki subaylardan ağır zayiat verdik. Bazı mevkilerin vekilin vekilinin vekiliyle doldurulması gerekti, kimileriyse öylece bomboş kaldı. Güverte klanları, boşta kalmış ekipleri kimlerin devralacağını kararlaştırmakla meşgul."
